scripts.test-exclusive: ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Consumer 1' 'node exclusive/consumer1.js'; ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Consumer 2' 'node exclusive/consumer2.js'; ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Producer' 'node exclusive/producer.js'
scripts.test-failover: ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Consumer 1' 'node failover/consumer1.js'; ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Consumer 2' 'node failover/consumer2.js'; ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Producer' 'node failover/producer.js'
scripts.test-key-shared: ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Consumer 1' 'node key_shared/consumer1.js'; ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Consumer 2' 'node key_shared/consumer2.js'; ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Producer' 'node key_shared/producer.js'
scripts.test-shared: ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Consumer 1' 'node shared/consumer1.js'; ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Consumer 2' 'node shared/consumer2.js'; ttab -a iTerm2 -t 'Producer' 'node shared/producer.js'
